title: How many "banked" games do you start at when you hit Masters?
body:
I'm one game off hitting Masters but am reluctant to do so this far from the end of the season.

I know Master tier has a more strict decay system where you store your games played (up to 10) and is subtracted by one each day.

What I'd like to know is, how does this work as soon as you hit Master?

Will I decay after one day if I don't play after hitting Mater?

replies.body: Hey, grats on your progress!  You'll want to start banking games right away.  Because this tier is so competitive, there is no spot holding so you'll want to play consistently to stay on top.
So just to confirm, games played in the promos/diamond don't count towards stored games?

Nope, but I dug a bit deeper into this and believe that you might actually get 3 banked games at the start to help out.  We don't have a lot of information on this available to players beyond our [ranked play FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ), so I'll be trying to get more details for more visibility in the future.  Sorry for the confusion!

Turns out no, previous games in diamond/promos do count.

I have 10 days to decay.
